Are you sure about that?  I saw one comment there and it was in=
 
cyrillic, which is what Russian uses.  I also heard "Gdye," which 
is "Wh=
ere" in Russian, "Dobre," which is "Good," and the 
pronunciation is defini=
tely Russian.  The title of the post is in 
Cyrillic.  Unfortunately, I'd h=
ave better luck if I saw the cyrillic 
text.
